text: Agar har us shaks ke paas jisne zulm kiya hai, rooh e zameen ki daulat bhi ho to us azaab se bachne ke liye woh usey fidiya (expiation) mein dene par aamada ho jayega. Jab yeh log is azaab ko dekh lenge to dil hi dil mein pachtayenge magar unke darmiyan poorey insaf se faisla kiya jayega, koi zulm unpar na hoga
